title: Silent Karthus o_0
body:
Both me and a buddy have played Karthus recently....and neither of us can hear his lines nowadays when we play as him.
Confuses me and breaks the heart of my buddy, as he mains Karthus and always.... ALWAYS -.- ...... Says whatever Karthus says when Karthus says it.

replies.body:
Hiya Lintu Puck! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to get this resolved ASAP!
